entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Athabasca 12:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
